76 // InitializerListRank Struct
77 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------

92 template <typename T, typename SizeType = std::size_t>
93 struct InitializerListRank : std::integral_constant<SizeType, 0> {};
94 
107 template <typename T, typename SizeType = std::size_t>
108 constexpr auto initializer_list_rank_v =
109  InitializerListRank<T, SizeType>::value;
110 
124 template <typename T, typename SizeType>
125 struct InitializerListRank<std::initializer_list<T>, SizeType>
126  : std::integral_constant<SizeType,
127  initializer_list_rank_v<T, SizeType> + 1> {};
128 
129 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
130 // tiled_range_from_il free function
131 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
132 
165 template <typename T,
166  typename U =
167  std::array<TiledRange1, initializer_list_rank_v<std::decay_t<T>>>>
168 auto tiled_range_from_il(T&& il, U shape = {}) {
169  using clean_type = std::decay_t<T>;
170  constexpr auto ranks_left = initializer_list_rank_v<clean_type>;
171 
172  if constexpr (ranks_left == 0) { // Scalar or end of recursion
173  return TiledRange(shape.begin(), shape.end());
174  } else {
175  // The length of this initializer_list
176  const auto length = il.size();
177  TA_ASSERT(length > 0);
178 
179  // This nesting level = (total-nestings) - (nestings-left)
180  shape[shape.size() - ranks_left] = TiledRange1(0, length);
181  return tiled_range_from_il(*il.begin(), std::move(shape));
182  }
183 }
184 
185 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
186 // flatten_il free function
187 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
188 
227 template <typename T, typename OutputItr>
228 auto flatten_il(T&& il, OutputItr out_itr) {
229  constexpr auto ranks_left = initializer_list_rank_v<std::decay_t<T>>;
230 
231  // We were given a scalar, just copy its value
232  // (input of std::initializer_list ends recursion on ranks_left == 1)
233  if constexpr (ranks_left == 0) {
234  *out_itr = il;
235  ++out_itr;
236  }
237  // We were given a vector or we have recursed to the most nested
238  // initializer_list, either way copy the contents to the buffer
239  else if constexpr (ranks_left == 1) {
240  out_itr = std::copy(il.begin(), il.end(), out_itr);
241  }
242  // The initializer list is at least a matrix, so recurse over sub-lists
243  else {
244  const auto length = il.begin()->size();
245  for (auto&& x : il) {
246  TA_ASSERT(x.size() == length); // sub-lists must be the same size
247  out_itr = flatten_il(x, out_itr);
248  }
249  }
250  return out_itr;
251 }
252 
253 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
254 // array_from_il free function
255 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
256 
289 template <typename ArrayType, typename T>
290 auto array_from_il(World& world, T&& il) {
291  using element_type = typename ArrayType::element_type;
292  using tile_type = typename ArrayType::value_type;
293 
294  static_assert(initializer_list_rank_v<std::decay_t<T>>> 0,
295  "value initializing rank 0 tensors is not supported");
296 
297  auto trange = tiled_range_from_il(il);
298  ArrayType rv(world, trange);
299 
300  for (auto itr = rv.begin(); itr != rv.end(); ++itr) {
301  std::vector<element_type> buffer;
302  auto range = rv.trange().make_tile_range(itr.index());
303  buffer.reserve(range.volume());
304  flatten_il(il, buffer.begin());
305  *itr = tile_type(range, buffer.data());
306  }
307  return rv;
308 }

312 // Typedef of an initializer list for a vector
313 template <typename T>
314 using vector_il = std::initializer_list<T>;
315 
316 // Typedef of an initializer list for a matrix
317 template <typename T>
318 using matrix_il = std::initializer_list<vector_il<T>>;
319 
320 // Typedef of an il for a rank 3 tensor
321 template <typename T>
322 using tensor3_il = std::initializer_list<matrix_il<T>>;
323 
324 // Typedef of an il for a rank 4 tensor
325 template <typename T>
326 using tensor4_il = std::initializer_list<tensor3_il<T>>;
327 
328 // Typedef of an il for a rank 5 tensor
329 template <typename T>
330 using tensor5_il = std::initializer_list<tensor4_il<T>>;
331 
332 // Typedef of an il for a rank 6 tensor
333 template <typename T>
334 using tensor6_il = std::initializer_list<tensor5_il<T>>;
335 
336 } // namespace detail
